text: Nta we uzikorera umutwaro w’undi, kandi nihagira utabaza aremerewe n’ibyaha agira ngo yakirwe uwo mutwaro, nta na kimwe azakirwaho kabone n’iyo yatabaza abo bafitanye isano ya hafi. Mu by’ukuri (yewe Muhamadi), uburira abatinya Nyagasani wabo batamubona ndetse bakanahozaho iswala. N’uwiyejeje (yitandukanya n’ibyaha byose), mu by’ukuri aba yiyejeje ku bwe. Kandi kwa Allah ni ho byose bizasubira
